actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to prohibit busing.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no public school student shall, by any court, department, or agency of the United States, or of any State, be required to attend a particular school because of race, color, creed, national origin, or economic status. Grants Congress the power to enforce this article by appropriate legislation.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to prohibit busing.
